Generate 30 days' worth of social media posts in [TARGETLANGUAGE] that will engage and captivate your audience. These posts should be diverse, interesting, and relevant to your target audience. Consider using a mix of text, images, videos, and hashtags to maximize user engagement. [PROMPT]
PromptHint: [KEYWORD] or [topic of your posts, target audience 18-36]
